effect.name: Alpha Operations (SUPERCEDED)
effect.description:
Display and manipulation of the alpha channel.
This effect has been replaced by frei0r.alpha0ps_alpha0ps.
effect.author: Marko Cebokli

parameter.name: Display
Display
parameter.paramlistdisplay: Image,Alpha as gray,Gray + red,Selection on black,Selection on gray,Selection on white,Selection on checkers

parameter.name: Operation
Operation
parameter.paramlistdisplay: NO OP,Shave,Shrink hard,Shrink soft,Grow hard,Grow soft,Threshold
